description.hltext_display: 日本外相冲绳遭拒 “普天间”搬迁仍遥遥� 期
description.content:
中新网12月21日电 据共同社报道，日本外相前原诚司21日访问冲绳县，在那霸市内的宾馆与冲绳县知事仲井真弘多举行会谈，再次就写明把普天间机场搬至冲绳县名护市边野古地区的日美协议寻求冲绳方面的理解。但仲井真则要求政府另觅他处。
会谈中，前原诚司就民主党未能兑现去年众院选举时承诺的县外或国外搬迁向县民表示“由衷的歉意”。不过，仲井真提及他在11月的知事选举中承诺把机场迁至县外并获得连任，希望前原诚司将此看作是其“与冲绳县民的约定”。
继首相菅直人17、18日访问冲绳后，日本外相再次访问冲绳，但冲绳方面依然表示拒绝机场在县内搬迁。前原强调将通过归还美军嘉手纳基地以南地区、美国海军陆战队迁至关岛等措施，从整体上减轻冲绳的负担。
前原在会谈后前往美军瑞庆览军营，与驻冲绳美军最高将领、指挥官特瑞·罗布林中将交换了意见。

description.hltext_display: Betsson AB - Betsson öppnar shoppen på nytt
description.content:
I dag kl 15:00 öppnar Betsson sin shop på Götgatan 37 – för tredje gången.
Efter att Regeringsrätten i september inte meddelat prövningstillstånd i frågan om Betssons shop kunde hållas öppen med stöd av EU-rätten, har shoppen hållits stängd. Nu öppnar Betsson shoppen igen men den här gången har Betsson tvingats följa Lotteriinspektionens föreläggande från 2008 vilket innebär att inga av Betssons kännetecken eller logotyper längre finns i butiken.
Efter EU-domstolens domar i september i år anser Betsson att det finns stöd för att öppna shoppen.
”Eftersom det är lagligt att erbjuda speltjänster till betssons kunder kommer vi att fortsätta kämpa för att ge kunderna den valfrihet som borde vara en självklarhet” säger Betssons VD Pontus Lindwall i en kommentar.

description.hltext_display: Sprint Nextel Names Qwest Executive as New CFO
description.content:
­Sprint Nextel has announced that Joseph J. Euteneuer, 55, has agreed to become chief financial officer (VFO) of Sprint, succeeding Bob Brust, who is retiring. Sprint expects Euteneuer, who currently serves as executive vice president, chief financial officer for Qwest Communications, to join the company following the completion of the proposed merger between Qwest and CenturyLink. Brust, 67, will remain as CFO until that time.
"I am pleased to have a talented executive such as Joe Euteneuer join the Sprint leadership team," said Dan Hesse, Sprint CEO. "Joe has an excellent reputation in the industry and has a strong background in a variety of financial disciplines, including finance and accounting, mergers and acquisitions, and financial operations."
"I am looking forward to joining the Sprint team in 2011," said Euteneuer. "Watching Sprint's progress over the last few years has been remarkable. I'm excited to be a part of a company that has so much opportunity ahead of it, and I am looking forward to making a contribution."
"I want to thank Bob Brust for his service over the past few years," said Hesse. "I can't overstate the significance of Bob's contribution to Sprint's turnaround. He provided discipline and financial leadership that helped to put us on a solid financial path."
Before serving as Qwest's CFO, Euteneuer served as executive vice president and chief financial officer of XM Satellite Radio Holdings, a satellite radio provider, from 2002 until September 2008 after it merged with SIRIUS Satellite Radio. Before joining XM, Euteneuer held various management positions at Comcast and its subsidiary, Broadnet Europe. A native of Chicago, Euteneuer holds a bachelor's degree in accounting from Arizona State University, and he is a certified public accountant.

description.hltext_display: NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development Inaugurated
description.content:
To elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency and achieve academic excellence, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) of National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan, is inaugurated on December 22nd in 3rd floor, Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus.
“The most important function of a university is education, cultivating talents, and then research and social service. It is a university's mission to educate youth of the next generation. Education should include two aspects, teaching and learning. However, we mainly focus on the teaching of professors, neglecting the learning of students, which is allowing students to absorb as much knowledge as they can,” said President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai of National Cheng Kung University in his opening remark.
President Lai also mentioned, “National Cheng Kung University had established Center for Faculty Development which focused solely on the cultivation of teachers. Thus, I believe the newly inaugurated Center for Teaching and Learning Development must embody both aspects of teaching, developing teaching methods, and learning, discovering questions, raising questions and finding solutions. I believe this is the essence of education and the development direction of the future education of National Cheng Kung University.”
NCKU Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung revealed, “I am pleased to see that Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang has established the Center for Teaching and Learning Development. As I have often said, outstanding talents cannot be cultivated without excellent education, and universities cannot transform into top universities without outstanding talents.” Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung also explained, “As graduates return to their alma mater, they do not recall how wonderful a professor's research is and they only remember how strict the teaching of a professor is. Students' parents also do not consider how renowned a professor is in the research field and they only care about how well their children can learn from the school. Therefore, a university, especially a top university, needs to take both teaching and learning into account.” Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung stated, “In Taiwan, teachers often teach what they like and students often learn what they want. This is incorrect. As teachers devote themselves into teaching, they must observe the learning efficiency of the students from a different perspective. I hope the Center for Teaching and Development Learning can spread the concept for the teachers to realize the importance of education.”
NCKU Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang said, “After four years of efforts, Center for Teaching and Learning Development finally inaugurated today. For the past years, under the goal set by President Lai, the Office for Academic Affairs has devoted itself to humanistic and innovative education and cross-disciplinary learning. We are excited that the Center for Teaching and Learning Development, established to truly integrate all the resources at NCKU and to promote NCKU to a top university, is finally inaugurated.” Vice-President for Academic Affairs Tang also said, “We have visited research and teaching universities in The United States years ago, realizing that their centers for teaching and learning development have abundant resources, and we have also visited National Taiwan University and Chung Yuan Christian University, discovering that the former lacks integration and the latter lacks manpower. With the advantages of integrated resources and unified manpower as our foundation, I believe National Cheng Kung University can become an internationally top university in the future.”
The newly inaugurated NCKU Center for Teaching and Learning Development is located on the 3rd floor of Yun-Ping Building, Kuang-Fu Campus, and NCKU President Michael Ming-Chiao Lai, Senior Executive Vice-President Hwung-Hweng Hwung, Vice-President for Academic Affairs Ming-Jer Tang, Director of Center for Teaching and Learning Development J. J. Wang, Director of Center for General Education Wei-Yung Wang, Secretary General Woei-Shyan Lee, other directors, deans and dozens of personnel have attended the inauguration ceremony.
The NCKU Center for Faculty Development, established in 2006, aims to strengthen the professional teaching ability of teachers and teaching assistants; however, to achieve academic excellence and innovation and elevate teaching quality and student learning efficiency, the Center for Teaching and Learning Development (CTLD) is established.
National Cheng Kung UniversityNews CenterCrystal Chen, +886-6-275-7575 ext. 50042Fax: +886-6-238-9919crystal@mail.ncku.edu.tw

description.hltext_display: 怎样用手吃掉龙虾不失礼
description.content:
如果不用手来吃的确很难吃得尽兴，那就不如索性解放你的双手吧。我们的目标是：既吃得开心，也不要失礼！
在西餐厅吃海鲜
不用手吃掉龙虾
在西餐厅，盛盘的菜一般都不会带骨头或带鱼刺的，我们中国的饮食习惯是带骨头的肉吃起来会更香，带壳和带刺的海鲜和鱼吃起来会更美味，所以借助手的帮忙吃带骨头带刺的食物是再正常不过的事情了；但在国外，人们从小接受的教育就是正确使用刀叉吃东西，很少用到手吃东西(快餐除外)， 所以我们在西餐厅吃海鲜不要紧的，因为厨师一定会先把骨头或贝壳去掉才盛盘。 如烤龙虾，厨师一般不会把头和脚一起全部盛盘，外国人一般只会吃龙虾尾巴，因为这个部位是最多肉的； 如果去法国旅游或出差，在一些传统的法国餐厅里，服务员会把龙虾端到餐桌旁，当着客人的面演示一番：把龙虾壳取出，龙虾肉放到另外一个餐盘才上菜。优点是盛盘的龙虾只会有肉而不会有任何壳，缺点就是客人享受不到龙虾头的籽和虾钳的肉，服务员会把这些拿回厨房让厨师做汤底。
大部分西餐厅会提供一些方便吃龙虾的工具
用手吃掉龙虾
很多人会很好奇：在西餐厅吃饭，用手吃是不是很失礼？其实用手吃也一样可行，只要所吃的东西很难用刀叉解决的，完全可以用手吃；大部分西餐厅如果有龙虾或其他海鲜 (尤其是一些远海地方的海鲜拼盘)的菜式，都会提供一些方便吃的工具，比如： 围裙、 小长叉子、海鲜剥壳钳子和洗手碗等。
围裙的目的是以防海鲜酱汁飞溅到自己的衣服上，我们也可以把餐巾塞到衣领口覆盖着胸前领带位置， 有些西餐厅的餐巾还会专门有一个纽扣，这是方便男士把餐巾扣在衣领的纽扣上，围裙也是同一用途。
小长叉子，英文叫 lobster fork，是方便刮出壳里的肉；剥壳钳子叫 Cracker，有的海鲜的壳如龙虾钳子或蟹钳子壳太硬了牙齿咬不开，就需要借助这种钳子弄碎壳，方便把肉取出来。
餐厅也明白若不用手我们也无法吃得痛快，所以洗手碗是必备；一般碗里是温水配柠檬，或红茶配柠檬，吃完后洗手去除手粘粘的感觉和腥味；千万不要以为桌上摆放的这个碗是餐厅提供喝的柠檬茶；若没有提供洗手碗，餐厅可能也会提供湿纸巾，若这两样东西都没有的话，就只能吃完后去洗手间洗手了。 另外告诉大家一个小窍门，一般非常新鲜的龙虾或海鲜用手吃后，用一般洗手液洗过后应该没有腥味的， 若洗了好几次手还有腥味就代表海鲜不那么新鲜。那还有腥味怎么办？最有效的方式不是用洗手液，而是用牙膏洗手， 估计经常吃大闸蟹的朋友们都知道这个小窍门。 餐厅提供以上服务的绝对是鼓励顾客用手用餐，所以不要怕失礼。
龙虾大餐在国外是否很流行？
龙虾分好几种：加拿大东岸及美国靠近波士顿的龙虾品种都带有大钳子(Claws)，所以除了尾巴的肉之外，两个钳子里也有很多肉，不过运到国内的空运费不菲，所以这些波士顿龙虾在国内 比较少见，有的话也非常贵； 国内现在比较普遍的是澳洲龙虾， 澳洲龙虾没有大钳子，只有尾巴有肉。 南澳洲的龙虾价格要比西澳洲的龙虾价格高很多，所以一般在国内自助餐吃得到的是 西澳洲的龙虾。在国外，龙虾也属于高档的食物，龙虾大餐除了在自助餐上出现之外，也在高档的餐厅以龙虾高汤、龙虾肉等形式出现，不过外国人中有不少都对海鲜有过敏或忌口。 还有一些民族是不吃龙虾的，比如犹太人，他们因为犹太教的原因而忌吃靠深海底生物为食物的海鲜，所以龙虾、梭子蟹、生蚝他们都不吃。

description.hltext_display: Philippe Gijsels (BNP Paribas): “Focus zal in Europa op de periferie blijven liggen”
description.content: In de afgelopen weken ging er nauwelijks een dag voorbij dat er geen aandacht werd besteed aan de situatie in de Europese periferie. Dat zal in de komende weken ongetwijfeld zo blijven. De start van 2011 wordt belangrijk en dat om diverse redenen. Philippe Gijsels (BNP Paribas): “2011 start in ieder geval met een groot vraagteken voor de obligatiemarkten in de periferie. In de eerste maanden van het nieuwe jaar zal er namelijk nogal wat aanbod van staatsobligaties zijn. De vraag is in hoeverre de markt bereid zal zijn om dit aanbod op te nemen.” Aan vraagtekens is overigens geen probleem, we weten ook nog altijd niet hoe het Europees reddingsmechanisme na 2013 precies zal werken. Gijsels: “Eigenlijk verwachten we dat de markten zich in 2011 op dezelfde manier gaan gedragen als in 2010. De slinger zal heen en weer bewegen tussen de vrees dat het ‘te koud’ is in de geïndustrialiseerde landen en ‘te warm’ in de groeimarkten. Niemand wil een herhaling van de Grote Depressie van de jaren 30, maar de inflatiejaren 70 waren evenmin inspirerend. In ieder geval gaan de financiële markten zich volgend jaar blijven focussen op de globale onevenwichten.”

description.hltext_display: Drogas: quanto custa comprar um grama?
description.content:
Mesmo tendo sido maior a quantidade apreendida, a heroína foi comercializada em Portugal, ao longo do ano de 2009, a preços mais elevados do que os registados no ano anterior. O preço médio desta droga foi de 36,62 euros o grama, quando um ano antes era de 33,25 euros.
Os dados da Polícia Judiciária e do Instituto da Droga e da Toxicodependência referem que a droga mais cara vendida em Portugal é, desde 2005, a cocaína. No ano passado o grama custou em média 47,44 euros, enquanto um ano antes era vendido a 45,56 euros.
O haxixe terá sido a única droga cujo preço de comercialização nas ruas terá decrescido, passando de 3,28 euros o grama em 2008 para 2,99 euros registados no ano transacto.
A liamba atingiu um preço recorde desde que existem estimativas policiais sobre os preços de venda de drogas na rua. No ano passado, o preço do grama desta droga chegou aos 6,22 euros, quando em 2008 custava apenas 5,09 euros.
Em relação ao ecstasy não foi possível apurar um preço médio de venda nas ruas.
Sabe-se, no entanto, que um comprimido custava 5,27 euros em 2003 e que no ano passado a unidade era comercializada por apenas 2,80 euros.

description.hltext_display: Las nuevas hipotecas bajan un 14% en 2010
description.content:
Según los últimos datos de la Asociación Hipotecaria Española
21/12/2010.- El crédito hipotecario nuevo a finales de 2010 apenas superará los 135.000 millones de euros. Esta cifra supondrá un descenso del 14% respecto a los 157.000 millones registrados en 2009, según las previsiones de la Asociación Hipotecaria Española (AHE).
"A pesar de las diferentes medidas puestas en marcha para impulsar la transaccionalidad del mercado, en términos de nueva contratación, el mercado hipotecario no cerrará un ejercicio más positivo que el anterior", dice el informe de la AHE sobre 2010 y las perspectivas para el próximo año.
A falta de conocer los datos de actividad para los meses de noviembre y diciembre, la asociación estima que la cartera hipotecaria global para el conjunto del año podría verse reducida hasta un máximo del 2%. En este sentido, explica que la desaceleración de la contratación hipotecaria a lo largo de 2010 ha provocado que el saldo vivo del crédito hipotecario se haya mantenido por debajo de los niveles registrados a finales de 2009. Hasta octubre, acumula un descenso neto de 15.245 millones.
El saldo total de crédito hipotecario de las entidades financieras alcanzó en octubre los 1,084 billones de euros, lo que supone un descenso del 1,23% respecto a los 1,097 billones del mismo mes de 2009, cuando crecía a un ritmo del 0,8%, según los últimos datos de AHE, que confirman la fuerte ralentización que sufre esta actividad en España desde hace tres años.
Los últimos números ponen de manifiesto la brusca desaceleración que afecta al sector hipotecario desde que estalló la crisis de las hipotecas 'subprime' en Estados Unidos en agosto de 2007 y contrasta con los crecimientos del orden del 25% que llegó a experimentar el saldo del crédito hipotecario en la fase más aguda del 'boom' inmobiliario en España.
Por tipos de entidades, las cajas de ahorros redujeron el saldo hipotecario un 3,95% en octubre en tasa interanual, con 583.989 millones de euros, mientras que los bancos lo incrementaron en un 2,62%, hasta alcanzar 412.834 millones.
Para la AHE "no cabe duda" de que la situación que vive el mercado inmobiliario, con excedentes de vivienda e incertidumbre sobre la evolución futura de los precios, no sólo ha condicionado la actividad hipotecaria de 2010, sino que también incidirá en su futuro comportamiento.
En 2011, el comportamiento de la actividad hipotecaria puede ser "ligeramente más positivo" que el observado este ejercicio, sustentado en la mejora de la financiación a hogares, "ya que no se prevé una recuperación en el corto plazo de la financiación a las actividades inmobiliarias".
Además, en los próximos trimestres ve probable que se registren descensos del índice general de precios de le vivienda, pero resalta que su desarrollo depende tanto de la normalización de los mercados financieros, como del stock de viviendas en venta y el encuentro entre demanda y oferta de vivienda.
Sobre la morosidad, la AHE no prevé descensos generalizados para el conjunto del crédito, que se mantiene en una media del 5,5%, pero incide en que la tasa de impago del sector inmobiliario todavía podría verse incrementada.
La asociación que preside Santos González advierte de que la nueva regulación de consumo de capital y de requisitos de liquidez puede acabar dificultando y encareciendo el crédito ya que inmovilizan más recursos y penalizan determinadas actividades.
La persistencia de dificultades para obtener liquidez y su coste actual son otro de los retos a los que se enfrentan las entidades de crédito y que, indudablemente, van a determinar las condiciones financieras de los nuevos créditos hipotecarios, agrega.
En cuanto a la posible modificación de las garantías personales en los créditos hipotecarios o del establecimiento de obstáculos a los procesos de ejecución, la AHE indica que estas medidas, "socialmente demandadas por intentar suavizar los efectos de la crisis en la sociedad", endurecerían las condiciones de financiación de las entidades en los mercados de capitales "y pondrían en jaque los más de medio billón de títulos hipotecarios en circulación".

description.hltext_display: What is foreign Exchange Calculator, How it Works and Its Benefits
description.content:
You all would be thinking what is a foreign exchange calculator? To understand it let us get a brief idea of currency exchange. It is a known fact that all countries of the world have a unique currency. The exchange of currencies between people from different parts of the world is called currency exchange. While some people do it to benefit from the difference in the exchange rates some do it because they need currency of the other country as they are travelling there.
Foreign exchange rate or Currency Rate for a country is the rate at which its currency can be bought using some foreign currency. Currency Rate for a country keep fluctuating due to changes in the economic, political and social policies. It is possible that the dollar opens at 0.86 against Euro and fluctuates to 0.66 by the time market closes for the day.
How do you know that the value of a particular currency is increasing or decreasing? There are different ways to keep up to date with the changing foreign exchange rates. One of the easiest and best ways to do this is to use foreign exchange calculator. It is the easiest way as compared to others and so is the best way.
The biggest attraction of a foreign foreign exchange calculator is that it is easily available and people with even very little knowledge of using Currency Rate to increase earnings can use it to their benefit. It can be found online using Google or any other search engine. But you cannot just go with any exchange rate calculator as there are chances that some online calculators might not be updated regularly and you would be looking to old rates. Hence it is recommended to use only the best or the most used currency calculator.
Another side effect of using a less known foreign exchange calculator is that they might not include foreign exchange rates of all countries of the world. This might lead you to draw some other conclusions like the country does not have its own currency. Good exchange rate calculator is sure to include all currencies of the world.
All online foreign exchange calculators are designed and developed around the same concept that is user should be able to convert the currency swiftly and easily. Hence they all have common design, make, features and offerings. Feed in the required data and press enter to get the converted prices. Yes, it will display the exchanged rates like if you wish to convert $100 to pounds the end result displayed will be the converted values.
It is a must have for people who want to monitor the constantly changing market and benefit by exchanging the currencies at the right time. Nowadays with the advancement of technology you do not even need a computer to regularly check the exchange rates. There are many mobile applications which have been built to work as a currency exchange convertor considering the latest Currency Rate in the market. Of course you will need smart phone and internet connection to be able to use it but you do not have to pay anything extra once you have downloaded the currency converter to the mobile.
To benefit from changing currency rate it is important you keep a close eye on the market fluctuations using a foreign exchange calculator.

description.hltext_display: Toshiba отмечает успешное окончание года: передовые технологии и новые товары
description.content:
Компания Toshiba отмечает успешное окончание года, выпустив ряд новых продуктов, включая новинку Libretto W100, отличающихся передовыми технологиями. Уходящий год стал годом технологических достижений различных компаний, которые внесли свой вклад в развитие отрасли. Такие компании как Toshiba постоянно совершенствуют свои товары и их дизайн, внедряя новые технологии и делая взаимодействие пользователей с цифровыми устройствами проще, чем когда-либо.
Компания Toshiba отмечает успешное окончание года, выпустив ряд новых продуктов, включая новинку Libretto W100, отличающихся передовыми технологиями. Уходящий год стал годом технологических достижений различных компаний, которые внесли свой вклад в развитие отрасли. Такие компании как Toshiba постоянно совершенствуют свои товары и их дизайн, внедряя новые технологии и делая взаимодействие пользователей с цифровыми устройствами проще, чем когда-либо.
С момента выпуска первого в мире ноутбука Toshiba T1100 в апреле 1985 г., компания остается первопроходцем на рынке портативных компьютеров. Все большее количество людей отдает предпочтение основному принципу использования ноутбуков «где угодно и когда угодно». Тонкие и легкие ноутбуки Toshiba, известные своим стильным дизайном и набором функций, созданы как раз для того, чтобы пользователь мог оставаться на связи с друзьями в различных социальных сетях и вовремя получал всю необходимую информацию.
Далее перечислены последние новинки компании Toshiba, представленные в этом году.
Уникальный ноутбук с двумя сенсорными экранами
Модель Libretto W100 демонстрирует гениальность и изобретательность инженеров компании Toshiba, разработавших уникальный компьютер для создания, потребления и хранения информации. Ноутбук Libretto W100 с двумя сенсорными дисплеями диагональю 7 дюймов предназначен для пользователей, которые хотят быть в авангарде разработок портативных компьютеров и иметь возможность наслаждаться новейшими веб-технологиями с помощью уникального пользовательского интерфейса.
Ноутбук Libretto W100 действительно уникален. Вы можете держать его вертикально, как книгу, чтобы прочесть разворот газеты, или расположить горизонтально, используя верхний экран для чтения документа, а нижний для того, чтобы делать в нем пометки. Помимо прочего, нижний экран удобен для размещения виртуальной клавиатуры, тогда как сам компьютер можно использовать в качестве обычного ноутбука. При этом легкого прикосновения пальца достаточно, чтобы перетащить иконки, медиафайлы и документы с одного экрана на другой.
Функции беспроводной связи обеспечат удобный доступ к интернету, так что вы легко сможете получать и отправлять короткие сообщения или почту, оставаться на связи с друзьями в социальных сетях, загружать элетронные версии газет и журналов и смотреть видео.
Пространство 3D
Satellite A665 - первый 3D ноутбук от Toshiba, который подарил пользователям неповторимые впечатления от технологии 3D. Мультимедийный портативный компьютер способен воспроизводить видео с помощью встроенного 3D Blu-ray-привода[1].
В комплекте с технологией NVIDIA 3D Vision[2] поставляются затворные стереоочки, которые в сочетании с инфракрасным излучателем большого радиуса действия (подключается через USB) позволяют получить стереоскопическое изображение потрясающей четкости, яркости и глубины. Ноутбук оснащен высокопроизводительным графическим процессором NVIDIA и 39,6-сантиметровым (15,6”) дисплеем TruBrite HD с LED-подсветкой (120 Гц). Модель Satellite A665 оснащена стереосистемой премиум-класса Harman Kardon и новейшей технологией Dolby® Advanced Audio, дополняющими изображение мощным и живым звуком. Кроме того, функция Sleep and Music позволяет наслаждаться музыкой с подключенного к стереосистеме Harman Kardon MP3-плеера даже тогда, когда ноутбук выключен.
Функциональность в компактном корпусе
Благодаря мощному процессору и технологии охлаждения Airflow Cooling Technology в ноутбуке Toshiba Satellite R630 превосходно сочетаются стильный надёжный корпус и лучшая в классе производительность. Ноутбук с экраном 13,3 дюйма в прочном корпусе из магниевого сплава со сверхпрочной сотовой текстурой корпуса под ладонями, обеспечивающими защиту от повреждения внутренних деталей. В свою очередь влагозащищенная клавиатура гарантирует безопасность и сохранность ваших данных при случайном попадании жидкости.
Компьютер может работать до 8 часов без подзарядки (согласно Mobile Mark 2007), что особенно важно, если вы находитесь в пути, а вкупе с удивительно тонким и легким дизайном это превращает Satellite R630 в идеальный ноутбук, который можно носить с собой повсюду. Стильный корпус толщиной 17 мм, вес в 1,4 кг и встроенный DVD-привод подарят вам возможность насладиться работой с истинно компактным вычислительным устройством. Помимо прочего впечатляющий дизайн означает повышенный срок эксплуатации компьютера, воплощая в себе надежность, комфорт и безупречный стиль.
Вы сможете выходить в интернет откуда угодно. Новейшие технологии сверхбыстрой связи по стандарту WiFi позволяют получить быстрый и безопасный доступ к интернету посредством любой беспроводной точки. Оставайтесь на связи, где бы вы ни находились.
Мобильное интернет-устройство на базе Android
Компания Toshiba вышла в сегмент мобильных интернет-устройств, выпустив первый продукт в этой категории - Toshiba AC100 в форм-факторе ноутбука. Этот сверхкомпактный компьютер поддерживает возможность постоянного подключения к сети, что делает его идеальным устройством для сетевого общения, веб-серфинга, доступа к электронной почте, просмотра и редактирования документов и воспроизведения мультимедийных файлов. Время автономной работы AC100 в режиме ожидания составляет до 7 суток.
Благодаря использованию операционной системы Android[3] компьютеру достаточно одной секунды для того, чтобы перейти из режима ожидания в полностью рабочий режим - как и смартфон, он всегда находится во включенном состоянии. В режиме попеременного воспроизведения видео и веб-серфинга время автономной работы устройства составляет не менее 8 часов.
Представленный в черно-оранжевом цветовом решении AC100 обладает интуитивно понятным интерфейсом, предлагающим возможность максимальной персонализации рабочего стола путем загрузки и установки приложений и виджетов. Кроме того, устройство предлагается с рядом предустановленных программ, в том числе Documents To Go для просмотра и редактирования документов Microsoft Office и просмотра PDF; почтовым клиентом с поддержкой POP3, IMAP и Exchange; приложением для обмена мгновенными сообщениями; веб-браузером Opera Mobile, а также Toshiba Media Player для воспроизведения музыкальных, видеофайлов и просмотра фотографий.
Пользователям интернет-устройства также предоставлена возможность настройки пяти рабочих столов, которые могут меняться автоматически, в зависимости от текущего местонахождения, определяемого по SSID[4]. Например, владелец устройства может вынести ярлыки для рабочих приложений и виджеты, которые пригодятся ему в работе, и соответствующий рабочий стол будет появляться тогда, когда пользователь находится в офисе. По возвращении домой на экран будут выводиться личные приложения и виджеты, а в каком-либо другом месте будет появляться рабочий стол, ориентированный на развлечения и отдых.
В основе всех этих инноваций лежит непрерывная работа компании Toshiba, которая стремится обеспечить своих потребителей новейшими качественными и надежными устройствами которые призваны сделать жизнь более удобной и приятной.
О компании Toshiba Europe GmbH
Toshiba Europe GmbH (TEG) является дочерней компанией японской корпорации Toshiba. Toshiba - признанный лидер и поставщик инновационных решений в области высоких технологий, производитель широкого ассортимента продуктов, включающего электротехнические товары и сложные электронные изделия. Штаб-квартира регионального подразделения компании TEG располагается в г.Нойсе, Германия; TEG состоит из четырех подразделений: Computer Systems, Storage Device Products, Consumer Products и Electronic Systems Operations. Вместе эти подразделения выпускают лидирующие на рынке портативные компьютеры и другие мобильные продукты и решения, а также жесткие диски, DVD-устройства, ЖК-панели, телевизоры и оргтехнику. Являясь основной структурой Toshiba в регионе EMEA, компания TEG оказывает поддержку и способствует развитию локальных представительств.
Основанная в 1875 году группа компаний Toshiba сегодня объединяет более 740 локальных компаний с общим штатом 199,000 сотрудников. Годовой оборот группы превышает 6.6 триллионов японских йен (73 миллиардов долларов США).
[1] Требуется дополнительно загружаемое обновление программного обеспечения, которое доступно с осени 2010 г.
В зависимости от конфигурации
[2] NVIDIA 3D Vision
Некоторые люди могут испытывать осложнения, связанные со здоровьем, из-за воздействия определенных 3D-изображений. Родители должны контролировать детей во время эксплуатации видеоадаптера. Если вы или ваш ребенок испытываете какие-либо проблемы, то прекратите использование адаптера и обратитесь за консультацией к врачу. Внимательно прочтите инструкцию по работе с NVIDIA 3D Vision и пройдите специальный тест User Vision Test, расположенный в мастере установки до использования адаптера. Если возникнет чрезмерное мерцание, то измените частоту обновления вашего экрана.
[3] Поступит в продажу с некоторыми дополнениями.
[4] SSID (Service Set Identifier) - название точки доступа WLAN, определяемое в процессе ее настройки.

description.hltext_display: Newest 'Call of Duty' video game sales reach $1B
description.content:
Sales of the video game "Call of Duty: Black Ops" have topped $1 billion in less than six weeks.
Activision says people around the world spent $650 million on "Call of Duty: Black Ops" in its first five days on sale and players have logged more than 600 million hours playing the multiplayer, first-person shooter game since it went on sale Nov. 9.
The game, set during the Cold War, is the seventh in the "Call of Duty" franchise from Activision Publishing Inc. Earlier games were set in World War II and in the near future.
Last year's "Call of Duty," subtitled "Modern Warfare 2," brought in $550 million sales in the first five days after it launched in Nov. 2009 and $1 billion in its first two months.

description.hltext_display: 《让子弹飞》中姜文“摸胸”的伦理问题
description.content:
核心提示：摸胸一举，有没有这个层面上的危害，还是可以商榷的。不要动不动把青少年当成傻帽……
《让子弹飞》中，姜文上了刘嘉玲的床后表态:“若我有不轨夫人你随时开枪”，随即便是“你有需要的话我也绝不推辞”，镜头一拉，他的手一直按在她的胸上。刘嘉玲则一脸浪笑做花痴状、享受状。
这个场景，揣度创作者的主观意图，应该并没有什么微言大义，不过是纯为娱乐观众所为。如果要有所阐释，那也可以说，一边道貌岸然，一边上下其手，这倒也表现出了很多男人的普遍“狼”性―――色狼的狼，是对男性群体的一个戏谑式嘲讽。
据称大S在电影《爱的发声练习》中和张孝全的床戏惹得婆婆张兰大为不满，儿子的婆娘，怎么就让别的男人摸来摸去，是可忍，孰不可忍。但估计梁朝伟不会因老婆被摸胸而不爽，周韵也不会因老公摸人胸而不满。盖大家都是老戏骨，要说不爽，梁朝伟和汤唯在《色，戒》中赤条条来去无牵挂，那才真叫惊世骇俗。所以，在影视伦理上，摸胸不是问题，但在世俗伦理中，问题还是来了。央视主播郭志坚在博客上痛批《让子弹飞》，“电影的吸引力不是靠展示当众剖腹和把手放在女性敏感部位”，他担心这会给青少年的身心“注入一股非理性的冲动”。
摸胸一举，有没有这个层面上的危害，还是可以商榷的。不要动不动把青少年当成傻帽，他们固然不成熟，却也绝非毫无判断力，分不清电影和现实。一个很浅层的摸胸动作，大可不必如此神经过敏。
但这个场景，细究起来，其实亦大有可玩味处。虽说纯为娱乐，但在摸者的道貌岸然和被摸者的欣然迎合中，传递了一种陈旧的、腐朽的男性心理。这未必是自觉，但可以说是一种潜意识。片中，姜文要摸，还要摸得好像正气凛然，摸得天经地义；刘嘉玲被摸，要表现被摸得欢欣雀跃、充满期待。女性对男性身体的无条件迎合，是中国古代士大夫文人在创作中津津乐道的“母题”之一，在无数古代言情小说文本中，女子对男子的主动迎合，有许多赤裸和香艳的描述，这和生活现实其实是背道而驰的。除了青楼，良家妇女有着诸多清规戒律，勾搭成奸的几率微乎其微，所以，文人们要在文本中大书特书，以完成某种心理补偿。戏中，刘嘉玲的放荡、主动、迎合，很难说没有主创者的某种潜意识作祟。
因为这一摸，实在太不合逻辑。即便戏中的夫人天生淫荡，她也不可能对着一个杀人不眨眼的土匪未经了解便迅速释放其万种风情；土匪要摸，也大可不必如此装腔作势、酸文假醋。所以，姜文“摸胸”的伦理问题在于，多少年过去了，我们不幸还在大银幕上看到这一心理补偿的陈旧桥段。林如敏

description.hltext_display: 4800 ميليارد تومان به حساب مردم واريز شد
description.content:
يك چهارم از منابع هدفمند كردن يارانه‌ها، نيمه سوم سال به عنوان دو ماه يارانه نقدي بدون احتساب يارانه نان واريز شده است.
ایلنا: 4800 ميليارد تومان يارانه نقدي به عنوان مرحله اول پرداخت نقدي به حساب مردم واريز شد.
به گزارش خبرنگار ايلنا، اين رقم بر مبناي 60 ميليون خانوار ثبت نام شده در طرح ساماندهي اطلاعات اقتصادي خانوار محاسبه شده است. براساس اعلام دولت يارانه نقدي براي هر نفرطي دوماه 81 هزار تومان بوده و به حساب افراد واريز شده است.
براساس اين گزارش، مجلس در قانون بودجه سال 89 كل كشور به دولت اجازه داد تا 20 هزار ميليارد تومان به عنوان منابع يارانه در سال اول اجراي اين قانون برداشت كند كه اين رقم شامل سهم صنعت،تامين اجتماعي و يارانه نقدي مي‌شود. اگرچه در قانون بودجه زمان اجراي اين قانون از اول فروردين سال 89 در نظر گرفته شده است اما به دليل آن‌كه برآورد دولت از اولين سال اجراي اين قانون 40 هزار ميليارد تومان بود و مجلس چنين رقمي را تصويب نكرد،اين قانون به نيمه دوم سال محول شد كه در نهايت از ابتداي آذرماه به اجراگذاشته شد.
اين گزارش مي افزايد؛ يك چهارم از منابع هدفمند كردن يارانه‌ها نيمه سوم سال به عنوان دو ماه يارانه نقدي بدون احتساب يارانه نان واريز شده است.

description.hltext_display: Record barra bagged at Monduran
description.content:
LAKE Monduran can claim bragging rights to being the premiere barramundi fishing spot, after what is believed to be a world record-breaking catch was claimed there this week.
Fishing from a kayak, Denis Harrold landed a monster fish that tipped the scales at 44.6kg. It measured in at 135cm with a whopping girth of 107cm.
The Monduran fish broke the old world mark of 37.85kg – held since 1999 from Lake Tinaroo, in far north Queensland – by almost 7kg.
Mr Harrold said once it realised it was hooked, the giant fish peeled 80m of 30lb braid from the reel before crashing across the lake’s surface.
“When I heard it crash, I knew it was a big fish,” Mr Harrold said.
“I didn’t realise it was a world record barra, but I knew it was a snodger.”
To see the great big barra and find out how Mr Harrold reeled it in, read tomorrow's NewsMail.

event_or_fact.property: once it realised it was hooked, the giant fish peeled 80m of 30lb braid from the reel before crashing across the lake?s surface

description.hltext_display: "Mối quan hệ H� n Quốc-Việt Nam có một không hai"
description.content:
Quan hệ hợp tác giữa Hàn Quốc và Việt Nam đang phát triển nhanh chóng trên tất cả các lĩnh vực, đây là mối quan hệ "đặc biệt" và "có một không hai."
Đại sứ Hàn Quốc tại Việt Nam Park Suk-hwan đã nhấn mạnh như vậy tại Hội thảo “Quan hệ đối tác chiến lược Hàn Quốc-Việt Nam, Hàn Quốc-ASEAN: Cơ hội và thách thức” do Học viện Ngoại giao và Đại sứ quán Hàn Quốc phối hợp tổ chức tại Hà Nội ngày 21/12 nhân dịp kỷ niệm 18 năm thiết lập quan hệ giữa hai nước (22/12/1992-22/12/2010).
Đại sứ Park Suk-hwan cho biết, mặc dù vẫn còn bị ảnh hưởng bởi cuộc khủng hoảng tài chính toàn cầu, nhưng dòng vốn đầu tư của Hàn Quốc vào Việt Nam vẫn không ngừng tăng lên trong năm 2010.
Theo đại sứ, kim ngạch thương mại song phương dự kiến đạt 13 tỷ USD trong năm nay (tăng 30% so với năm 2009), và hai nước đặt mục tiêu nâng con số này lên 20 tỷ USD vào năm 2015. Hàn Quốc cũng là nhà tài trợ lớn thứ hai của Việt Nam trên lĩnh vực viện trợ phát triển chính thức (ODA).
Chia sẻ quan điểm trên, Giám đốc Học viện Ngoại giao, Đại sứ Dương Văn Quảng nói: “Với tốc độ phát triển quan hệ nhanh hiếm thấy suốt 18 năm qua, Hàn Quốc đã trở thành một trong những đối tác hàng đầu của Việt Nam và Việt Nam cũng là đối tác quan trọng hàng đầu của Hàn Quốc ở Đông Nam Á.”
Hàn Quốc hiện đứng thứ hai trong số các quốc gia và vùng lãnh thổ đang đầu tư trực tiếp tại Việt Nam với 2.056 dự án còn hiệu lực tính đến hết tháng 9/2010, với tổng vốn đăng ký đạt 22.8 tỷ USD.
“Việc hai nước nhất trí nâng cấp quan hệ lên thành 'đối tác hợp tác chiến lược' tháng 10/2009 chính là kết quả tất yếu của quá trình phát triển quan hệ song phương thời gian qua, đồng thời thể hiện quyết tâm chung của chính phủ và nhân dân hai nước thúc đẩy mối quan hệ đó ngày càng phát triển tốt đẹp và sâu sắc hơn nữa trong thời gian tới,” ông Quảng nhấn mạnh.
Về quan hệ ASEAN-Hàn Quốc, ông Quảng cho biết trong những năm qua, thông qua nhiều cơ chế như Cấp cao ASEAN-Hàn Quốc, Hội nghị Bộ trưởng Ngoại giao ASEAN-Hàn Quốc, Đối thoại ASEAN-Hàn Quốc, ASEAN+3, Hội nghị cấp cao Đông Á (EAS), Diễn đàn khu vực ASEAN (ARF)… quan hệ hợp tác giữa hai bên được triển khai trên mọi lĩnh vực như chính trị-an ninh, kinh tế, thu hẹp khoảng cách phát triển, liên kết khu vực, tăng cường tính cạnh tranh, văn hóa-xã hội, và hợp tác giải quyết các vấn đề toàn cầu.
Tại cuộc hội thảo, các đại biểu đã thảo luận và đề xuất một số giải pháp nhằm tăng cường hơn nữa quan hệ Đối tác hợp tác chiến lược Việt Nam-Hàn Quốc, cũng như quan hệ Đối tác chiến lược ASEAN-Hàn Quốc trong thời gian tới, trong đó nhấn mạnh đến việc xác định các lĩnh vực ưu tiên hợp tác, xây dựng các cơ chế, thể chế nhằm thúc đẩy đối thoại và giao lưu giữa các thế hệ trẻ.
Đại sứ Hàn Quốc tại ASEAN Yang Bong-ryull đề nghị thiết lập cơ chế Hội nghị Bộ trưởng Hàn Quốc-Mekong, đồng thời kêu gọi các nước trong khu vực tận dụng các ưu đãi của Hiệp định thương mại song phương ASEAN-Hàn Quốc, nhằm hiện thực hóa mục tiêu kim ngạch thương mại song phương 150 tỷ USD vào năm 2015./.

description.hltext_display: ON THIS DAY: DECEMBER 22ND
description.content:
On this day articles started at the end of last season on the Brentford FC Fan Page on Facebook. It brings back, the good, the bad and everything we love about Brentford Football Club.
John Brooks two goals earned Brentford an away to Mansfield Town as the Bees won 2-1.
1968
Chic Brodie was in goal as Brentford lost 2-0 to Wrexham at the Racecourse ground.
1973
Roger Cross scored the Brentford consolation at Oakwell as Barnsley beat the Bees 2-1.
1985
Robbie Cooke was the match winner as Brentford beat Bristol Rovers 1-0 at Griffin Park.
1984
Brentford lost 4-0 to Hull City at Boothrey Park to make it an even longer journey home.
1991
Gary Blissett scored twice and Marcus Gayle also scored a goal as Brentford beat Exeter City 3-0 at Griffin Park.
1995
Robert Taylor and Dean Martin scored as the Bees drew with Wrexham 2-2 at the Racecourse ground.
Do you remember these games? Why not discuss them on the the Brentford FC

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: Lindsay Lohan droht schon wieder Haft
description.content:
vor 9 Min.
Los Angeles/New York (dpa) - Ein handgreiflicher Streit könnte Lindsay Lohan schon wieder ins Gefängnis bringen. Die Schauspielerin soll vor mehr als einer Woche mit einer Betreuerin in der Betty-Ford- Klinik aneinandergeraten sein, in der sie als Teil einer Verurteilung ihre Drogensucht auskurieren soll. Diesen Artikel weiter lesen
Ähnliche Fotos/Videos
Nach Angaben des Internetdienstes «TMZ» vom Dienstag stritt die 24-Jährige mit der Frau, letztlich habe es eine «physische Auseinandersetzung» gegeben. Die Betreuerin hat nun gegen Lohan Anzeige erstattet - und das könnte für die Schauspielerin mit einem halben Jahr Gefängnis enden. Denn Lohan steht immer noch unter Bewährung. Vor fast vier Jahren war sie gleich zweimal mit Kokain in der Tasche und Alkohol am Steuer erwischt worden. Die Strafe: einige Stunden Gefängnis, drei Jahre auf Bewährung und Entziehungskuren. Wegen ständiger Vor- und Rückfälle steht sie immer noch unter der Bewährung.

description.hltext_display: US Poised To Approve Nuclear Arms Pact With Russia
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.
Passage of the New START treaty appeared assured after 11 Republicans joined Democrats in a vote Tuesday to end debate on the pact. That signaled that Obama should have the two-thirds majority he needs when the Senate votes on final approval Wednesday.
The approval would mark a big comeback for Obama's arm controls efforts after the treaty appeared all but dead just weeks ago. It also would allow Obama to continue efforts to improve relations with Russia.
Ratification would mark a third recent major political victory for Obama, even though his Democratic party was trounced in last month's congressional elections. In recent days he won passage of a bipartisan tax deal and a vote ending the ban on gays openly serving in the military.
"We are on the brink of writing the next chapter in the 40-year history of wrestling with the threat of nuclear weapons," Foreign Relations Committee Chairman John Kerry, a Democrat, said after the vote.
The treaty would limit each country's strategic nuclear warheads to 1,550, down from the current ceiling of 2,200. It also would establish a system for monitoring and verification. U.S. weapons inspections ended last year with the expiration of a 1991 treaty.
The administration was adamant that it be ratified this year because the Democrats' majority in the Senate is set to shrink by five in January and waiting could have meant months of delay or defeat.
Republicans accused Democrats of rushing approval of the treaty for political reasons. They have asserted it would limit U.S. missile defense options and argued it has insufficient procedures to verify Russia's adherence.
When Jon Kyl, the leading Republican on negotiations over the treaty, suggested a delay last month, Obama appeared unlikely to find the nine Republican votes needed for passage.
But he and top members of his administration lobbied intensely, with Obama postponing his Christmas vacation in Hawaii. They enlisted support from top military officials and big-name Republicans from past administrations who argued the treaty was essential for U.S. national security.
In the end, they persuaded enough Republicans to defy the party's top two leaders in the Senate and support the pact.
"We know when we've been beaten," Republican Sen. Orrin Hatch told reporters hours before Tuesday's vote.
Even the Senate's No. 3 Republican, Lamar Alexander, endorsed the accord, saying he was assured U.S. defenses would not be weakened.
The treaty will leave the United States "with enough nuclear warheads to blow any attacker to kingdom come," Alexander said on the Senate floor.
Republicans had tried to kill the treaty by forcing changes in its language that would have sent it back for negotiations with Moscow. Democrats were working to appease some Republican senators by letting them raise these issues in legislation accompanying the treaty that would not directly affect the treaty.
Most Republicans remained opposed.
"The administration did not negotiate a good treaty," Kyl said. "They went into the negotiations it seems to me with the attitude with the Russians just like the guy who goes into the car dealership and says, 'I'm not leaving here until I buy a car.'"
Though Kyl looks likely to vote on the losing side of the debate over the treaty, in his negotiations with the administration he did win Obama's commitment to modernize the remaining nuclear arsenal with projected spending of $85 billion over 10 years.
Some of that money is now in the pipeline, contained in a stopgap government funding bill that cleared Congress on Tuesday. The measure would finance the government, mostly at current levels, through March 4.
It makes an exception for nuclear security programs, allowing the government to spend money to modernize the United States' nuclear arsenal at a rate equal to Obama's $624 million request.

description.hltext_display: Militärövning nära Nordkoreas gräns
description.content:
I övningen ingår stridsflyg, stridsvagnar, artilleri och 800 soldater. Övningen görs samtidigt som läget är spänt efter Nordkoreas beskjutning av ön Yeonpyeong i gula havet väster om Korea. Övningen pågår i fyra dagar i de östra gränsvattnen intill Nordkorea och skarp ammunition kommer att användas.
Se klipp ovan.

description.hltext_display: كره‌جنوبي رزمايش‌هاي زميني و دريايي جديد برگزار مي‌كند
description.content:
رزمايش زميني كره‌جنوبي كه شامل توپخانه، جت‌هاي جنگنده و بيشترين تعداد نيروهاي نظامي اين كشور است، پنجشنبه برگزار مي‌شود. اين كشور همچنين تصميم دارد رزمايش دريايي سه روزه‌اي را در آب‌هاي شرقي شبه جزيره كره برگزار كند.
ایلنا: مقام‌هاي كره‌جنوبي چهارشنبه ـامروزـ از برنامه خود براي برگزاري رزمايش نظامي زميني و دريايي كه شامل بزرگ‌ترين رزمايش تويخانه‌اي اين كشور در نزديكي مرز كره‌شمالي نيز مي‌شود، خبر دادند.
به گزارش ايلنا به نقل از رويترز، رزمايش بزرگ زميني كره‌جنوبي كه شامل توپخانه، جت‌هاي جنگنده و بيشترين تعداد نيروهاي نظامي اين كشور مي‌شود، پنجشنبه برگزار خواهد شد.
«جو اون شيك»، يكي از مقام‌هاي نظامي كره‌جنوبي در اين‌باره گفت: «چنانچه كره‌شمالي به اقدامي مانند حمله ماه نوامبر دست بزند، رويكردهاي تلافي‌جويانه‌اي در پيش خواهيم گرفت.»
پيونگ‌يانگ هنوز به خبر برگزاري اين رزمايش‌هاي جديد واكنشي نشان نداده است.
يكي از مقام‌هاي رسانه‌اي در وزارت خارجه كره‌جنوبي گفت كه اين كشور همچنين تصميم دارد از امروز رزمايش دريايي سه روزه‌اي را در آب‌هاي شرقي شبه جزيره كره برگزار كند.
خبرگزاري «يونهاپ» در اين‌باره گزارش داد كه اين رزمايش دريايي در 100 كيليومتري مرزي آبي مشترك با كره‌شمالي و با حضور حداقل شش قايق نيروي دريايي انجام مي‌شود.
يكي از فرماندهان نظامي كره‌جنوبي در پاسخ به پرسشي مبني بر اين‌كه آيا بمباران توپخانه‌اي جزيره «يون‌پيونگ» توسط كره‌شمالي در ماه گذشته ميلادي در طرح‌ريزي اين رزمايش موثر بوده است يا خير، گفت: «بله، اين رزمايش نمايش قدرتي عليه حمله اخير كره‌شمالي است.»
حمله توپخانه‌اي كره‌شمالي به جزيره يون‌پيونگ چهار كشته بر جاي گذاشت و خشم شديد مردم كره‌جنوبي را به دنبال داشت.
نارضايتي مردم و برخي مسئولان كره‌جنوبي از عدم موضع‌گيري مناسب دولت اين كشور در قبال كره‌شمالي تا جايي بود كه وزير دفاع سابق كره‌جنوبي بعد از شدت گرفتن انتقادها از سمت خود استعفا داد.
اين حمله كره‌جنوبي، شديدترين درگيري دو كره بعد از جنگ سه ساله دهه 50 ميلادي را رقم زد.

description.hltext_display: 科比被逐拒绝媒体采访 博伊金斯透露取胜法则
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
腾讯体育讯 北京时间12月22日，湖人在结束了漫长的客场之旅后回到斯台普斯中心，但是在主场对阵雄鹿的比赛里却以79-98告负，结束了此前所取得的5连胜势头。
“我告诉他们说，他们从未打得如此糟糕过，”湖人主教练菲尔-杰克逊说，“这也是我们所担忧的地方，在比赛进入到下半时之后，我们打出的完全不是本该有的水准，而且再也没能重新找到以往的状态。”在此前双方的交战纪录当中，湖人对阵雄鹿就取得过6连胜，而且密尔沃基人在这场比赛前也吃到3连败，但尽管如此，雄鹿依然在伤兵满营的情况下击败卫冕冠军，结束了连败的颓势。
接下来的比赛湖人将迎来与热火的圣诞大战的对决，这样的豪门碰撞也吸引了整个联盟的注意力。“我猜想你们可能会将这场失败展望到接下来的比赛里，但我并不认为（这与热火之战有什么关系），”费舍尔说，“我并不觉得这根对手有什么关系，我只是认为我们没打出应有的水平罢了。或许在面对不同的对手时就会有不同的表现，但是我现在也说不准。”
科比在比赛还有2分7秒结束时被裁判吹了一次进攻犯规，结果大为不满，对着裁判怒吼连续吃到技术犯规被驱逐出场，在赛后他也拒绝了记者们的采访。“我们就该输球，”奥多姆如此评价这场比赛说，“我们真的需要将球权转移起来，但是说实在的，我真的觉得这本场是我们本该拿下的比赛。”
本场比赛雄鹿最大的亮点是替补出战的博伊金斯，这名身高只有5尺5寸（1.65米）的小个子球员全场砍下22分，这是他本赛季的最高得分，其中命中了4记三分球。“他们经常是在第四节的时候才开始运转起来的，”博伊金斯说，“所以我们在此前就尽可能地将比分差距拉开。如果是在比赛当中你有努力地打球了，并且坚信能够获胜，那么你就能做到任何事情。”
对于博伊金斯的出色表现，雄鹿主教练斯凯尔斯也是赞不绝口，虽然“矮脚虎”的身高属于超级迷你型的，但却拥有一套能够在NBA这个巨人云集的联盟里生存的本领。“在很久以前他就学会了怎样将自己的身高劣势转化为优势，”斯凯尔斯说，“今晚上要是没有厄尔的话，我们根本就没法赢得这场比赛的胜利。”
（梧桐）

description.hltext_display: 日驻华大使：中日间超越夫妻关系即使吵架也不会离婚
description.content:
日本驻华大使丹羽宇一郎20日到访江苏南京，这是丹羽宇一郎今年7月出任日本驻华大使以来首次访问南京。丹羽宇一郎表示：“中日间超越夫妻关系，即使吵架也不会离婚”。他同时指出，此次南京访问是契机，将开启他明年遍访中国之门。
谈中日关系：两国只有友好下去
日本驻华大使丹羽宇一郎20日下午抵达江苏南京，展开三天的访问。由于近来钓鱼岛事件使中日关系受损，� 此大使南京之行备受各界关注。此间，多达13家日方媒体及数十家中方媒体的“长枪短炮”紧紧尾随大使之行。
丹羽宇一郎表示，这次来南京访问的一大重点是要促进两国的经济合作。目前在江苏的日本企业超过7000家，数量仅次于上海。而对于有日本媒体提问这次是否安排参观南京大� 杀纪念馆，丹羽宇一郎表示，之前来南京已经参观过，这次没有安排相关行程。
丹羽宇一郎说：“在过去的战争中，给中国国民带来了很多苦难，日本政府深刻反省，而且认识到自己的责任。日本跟中国只有搞好关系，只有友好下去，没有别的选择。这一次我到江苏省来访问，也是抱着这� �的想法。” 丹羽宇一郎希望以南京访问为契机，开启明年遍访中国之门。
谈国民感情：相互理解最为重要
丹羽宇一郎表示，促进中日友好关系，国民之间的理解最为重要。这也是他作为驻华大使的使命。
他说：“坦率地说，很多中国人不喜欢日本人，而� 个民意调查也表明，90％以上的日本民众没跟中国人说过话，没接触过中国人，不知道中国老百姓的生活到底是什么� �子。要改变这个情况，推动双方的交流是我的使命，作为大使就要作出更多努力，� 强两国民众的感情。”他告诉记者，每年有近100个日本青年来中国访问、交流，有机会接触当地老百姓，他也要到中国老百姓当中去。
“我是不是看上去更像中国人”
丹羽宇一郎21日与普通市民和中学生进行面对面的交流。谈到与中国普通民众交流的感受，丹羽宇一郎说：“我感觉非常好，所有中国民众对我们都非常友好，非常友好。”
丹羽宇一郎在南京明城墙下与老者一起交流打太极拳的心得，在玄武湖边与晨练的中国老太们一起� 家常。看着中国这些与自己年纪相仿的南京市民。大使甚至开玩笑问道“我是不是看上去更像中国人。”他同时不断告诉大家，每年都会在南京举行“日本文化周”，希望大家能多了解日本。 在南京外国语学� �，大使与学日语的中学生用日语亲切交流。并发表演讲。丹羽宇一郎称：“夫妻会吵架，甚至会离婚。但是中日间，是超越夫妻关系的，� 为我们是邻国，即便吵架也不能离婚。夫妻间、朋友间，难免会吵架。我们邻国，也难免会吵架。但任何一个国家都有极少部分怪怪的人，� �坏友好，我们可以不理这些人。我认为，中日间是� 千年都应该友好下去的邻国，而� 承友好的责任在年轻人身上。看到� 们的日语说得这么好，我非常高兴。我相信大家到了我这� �年纪的时候，中日间可以自由往来。我正为此努力。” 丹羽宇一郎 现年71岁的丹羽宇一郎是日本伊藤� 商事前社长，在商界乃至日本社会，享有很高的声望。早在上世纪80年代中国改革开放初期，他就被伊藤� 商事派到中国经商，对中国的政经社会十分了解，� �称“中国通”。同时，他还是江苏省政府的经济顾问，是个不折不扣的“江苏通”。
重庆晚报 2010年12月22日

description.hltext_display: ＜外交文書公開＞機密電報焼却の痕跡 沖縄返還密約関連で
description.content:
毎日新聞12月22日（水）15時0分
外務省が２２日公開した外交文書の中に含まれていた機密電報の焼却を示すとみられるメモ
外務省は２２日、７２年の沖縄返還をめぐる交渉などに関する外交文書２９１冊の一般公開を東京・麻布台の外交史料館で始めた。沖縄返還に際して米国が支払うことになっていた米軍用地の原状回復補償費４００万ドルを日本が肩代わりした密約をめぐるファイルの中から、３通の機密電報を焼却した痕跡を示すメモが見つかった。焼却処分を示す文書が見つかったのは初めて。また、目次や表紙がありながら文書本体が欠落しているものもあった。焼却された文書の内容は不明だが、意図的な廃棄も疑われかねず、外務省の文書管理のあり方が問われそうだ。
問題のファイルは、「沖縄関係１８ 沖縄返還交渉 機密漏（ろう）洩（えい）事件（国会対策等）」。原状回復補償費の肩代わりに関する機密公電のコピーを毎日新聞の西山太吉記者（当時）が外務省事務官から入手し、それを基に野党が国会で疑惑を追及した時期にまとめたとみられる交渉過程の関連文書や想定問答などがとじられている。
焼却を示すメモは、日米外相レベルで返還交渉の最終合意をする７１年６月９日前後に行われた愛知揆一外相とマイヤー駐日米大使による会談録などの一覧表のわきにあった。「機密電報」とのタイトルで、作成日の記載はなく、「５−１」「５−２」など八つを挙げ、うち三つの隣に、「焼却５／３１」と書き込まれていた。このメモ以降、会談録などが続くが、数字で示された「機密電報」が何を指し、何を焼却したかは不明だ。
また、ファイル内容を記した手書きの目次では、番号１の「沖縄返還交渉機密漏洩事件」が横線で消され、「文書なし」と書かれていた。他の文字と違う細い線と字で、事後的に書き込まれたとみられる。実際に、目次番号２〜１１の文書はとじられているが、「沖縄返還交渉機密漏洩事件」は表紙だけで文書は欠落していた。
その後の９４年３月に新たにタイプで作成された目次には「沖縄返還交渉機密漏洩事件」そのものが消え、この時期までに何らかのことから欠落した可能性が高いとみられる。
外務省外交記録・情報公開室は「焼却」について「４０年も前の文書管理については分からない。調べるにも限界がある。適切に処理した結果だと信じたい」と語った。【西田進一郎】

description.hltext_display: Traficantes armazenam droga e fazem subir os preços
description.content:
É na província de Helmand, no Sul do Afeganistão, que é cultivado quase metade do ópio produzido em todo o mundo - uma cultura que aumenta o magro rendimento dos agricultores, financia os taliban e alimenta a corrupção. Desde 2007, ano em que foram batidos recordes, a produção decaiu, mas a ONU alerta que os traficantes têm vindo a armazenar excedentes.
Nos anos 1980, o ópio afegão representava menos de um terço da produção mundial, mas a guerra e a procura de armas fomentou o negócio num país onde pouco mais de dez por cento da terra é arável. Há três anos, o Gabinete das Nações Unidas para as Drogas e o Crime (UNODC) contabilizava 193 mil hectares plantados com papoilas. Mais de 93 por cento do ópio usado no fabrico de heroína tinha então origem no Afeganistão, num total de 8200 toneladas. Os lucros com o narcotráfico representavam mais de metade do orçamento do país.
Uma tendência que começou a inverter-se em 2008, graças a uma combinação de tácticas mais agressivas de combate ao tráfico, incentivos à produção de culturas alternativas e à progressiva ocupação militar. Nesse ano a produção caiu seis por cento e em 2009 a quebra foi de dez por cento. Ainda assim, o ópio cultivado no país superava a procura mundial (estimada em cinco mil toneladas), mas a UNODC notava que o preço da heroína nas ruas se mantinha estável, alertando que os excedentes estariam a ser retidos com o objectivo de manter os preços elevados. Numa reunião com dirigentes da NATO, no final do ano passado, o então chefe da organização, António Maria Costa, calculava que existiriam mais de 12 mil toneladas de ópio armazenados no país, segundo um telegrama diplomático revelado pela WikiLeaks.
Stocks que estarão agora a ser usados, já que segundo o último relatório da UNODC, divulgado em Setembro, a produção de ópio caiu, este ano, 48 por cento face a 2009, em grande parte resultado de um fungo que devastou as plantações de papoila. A ONU lembra que a drástica redução fez disparar os preços da heroína (164 por cento face a 2009), o que poderá incentivar os agricultores a retomarem a produção de ópio.

description.hltext_display: Concessions offered in tuition fees row
Palácio de Buckingham anuncia casamento de Zara Phillips
New York AG accuses Ernst & Young of helping Lehman deceive investors
description.content:
NEW YORK New York's attorney general is suing accounting giant Ernst & Young, accusing it of helping defunct investment bank Lehman Brothers hide billions of dollars in debt from investors even as it teetered on the brink of financial collapse.
The civil lawsuit, filed by Attorney General Andrew Cuomo on Tuesday, days before he's due to be sworn in as the state's governor, marks the first government legal action stemming from the collapse of Lehman Brothers, one of the first milestones of Wall Street's 2008 meltdown.
It targets a practice known as "Repo 105," in which the lawsuit says Lehman Brothers made temporary overseas sales of securities, often lasting only days, and then used the money to pay off debts ahead of key quarterly reports to investors.
The system allowed the company to hold on to the inventory required by its customers while concealing debts from nervous investors, who otherwise might have sold off their shares.
The lawsuit claims that, as auditor, Ernst & Young signed off on the practice with full understanding that it was being used to deceive investors. From the launch of "Repo 105" in 2001 until the Lehman Brothers bankruptcy in 2008, Ernst & Young was paid more than $150 million for its auditing and accounting work for Lehman Brothers. Ernst & Young said in a statement that it would defend itself in court and called the lawsuit "a significant expansion of the Martin Act" used to prosecute the case.

description.hltext_display: Högskoleverket - Få doktorsexaminerade i näringslivet
description.content:
Två av tre personer med en doktorsexamen jobbar inom offentlig sektor, framför allt på universitet och högskolor. Betydligt färre finns ute i näringslivet. Det visar en ny rapport från Högskoleverket.
Högskoleverket har studerat gruppen doktorsexaminerade för att se hur etableringen på arbetsmarknaden ser ut och inom vilka olika verksamheter de finns.
Bland dem som tog en doktorsexamen under åren 2000 och 2002 hade 88 procent etablerat sig på arbetsmarknaden 2008. Bland dem som examinerades 2005 var andelen lägre, 80 procent. Runt 95 procent hade ett yrke som tillhör den högsta nivån när det gäller kvalifikationskrav.
Många blir kvar på lärosätena
Antalet forskarutbildade i landet har ökat med 35 procent under de senaste tio åren. Den kraftiga utbyggnaden har bland annat motiverats av att fler och fler forskarutbildade kommer att vara verksamma utanför universitet och högskolor och av det kommande generationsskiftet med stora pensionsavgångar. Det finns en stark tradition bland personer med doktorsexamen att arbeta på universiteten och högskolorna. Uppföljningen av dem som examinerades visar att omkring var tredje arbetar som universitets- och högskolelärare. Totalt sett arbetar cirka 65 procent inom stat, kommun eller landsting och bara runt 35 procent inom näringslivet. Det kan jämföras med att av alla förvärvsarbetande på den svenska arbetsmarknaden finns 66 procent inom näringslivet, vilket alltså är nästan dubbelt så stor andel jämfört med de forskarutbildade.
Naturvetare, medicinare och tekniker lämnar högskolan
Bland personer med en doktorsexamen inom medicin har nästan tre fjärdedelar lämnat universiteten, vilket inte är speciellt förvånande med tanke på att landstinget är den största arbetsgivaren. Majoriteten av naturvetarna och teknikerna etablerar sig också utanför högskolesektorn. Det motsatta gäller för doktorsexaminerade inom samhällsvetenskap och humaniora, där flertalet stannar inom högskolan.
Hela rapporten finns på www.hsv.se.

description.hltext_display: Báo động nguy cơ tấn công khủng bố ở Mumbai
description.content:
Từ khóa : Ấn Độ, Mumbai, Tấn công khủng bố, Lễ Giáng sinh
EMAIL PRINT SHARE CỠ CHỮ A A A
Quảng cáo
Thành viên LeT, gây ra các vụ tấn công đẫm máu ở Mumbai năm 2008, được đặc biệt chú ý khi Mumbai có nguy cơ xảy ra khủng bố. (Nguồn: AFP/TTXVN)
Hãng tin PTI của Ấn Độ cho biết ngày 21/12, an ninh đã được tăng cường ở thủ phủ tài chính Mumbai của Ấn Độ sau khi có những cảnh báo về nguy cơ xảy ra tấn công nhằm vào người nước ngoài tại thành phố này.
Cảnh sát Mumbai cho biết, các biện pháp an ninh quy mô đã được triển khai và được ban bố ở thành phố sau khi có tin tình báo về mối đe dọa khủng bố trước lễ Giáng sinh và Năm mới.
Tình báo cho rằng các tổ chức khủng bố đang có những âm mưu rõ rệt nhằm vào người nước ngoài trong hai ngày lễ này.
Các lực lượng an ninh cũng đã được triển khai rà soát ở một số khu vực đặc biệt, an ninh được tăng cường tối đa tại các khu chợ, địa điểm tôn giáo, nhà ga tàu hỏa và bến xe buýt.
Ngoài Mumbai, thành phố thương mại Ahmedabad ở miền Tây Ấn Độ cũng ban bố lệnh báo động do được xem là mục tiêu có thể bị tấn công.
Cảnh báo được đưa ra trong bối cảnh Tổng thống Nga Dmitry Medvedev tới Mumbai hôm nay (22/12) trong khuôn khổ chuyến thăm Ấn Độ.
PTI dẫn các nguồn tin chính thức nói rằng, tình báo còn lưu ý về khả năng các thành viên tổ chức Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) có trụ sở ở Pakistan thâm nhập Ấn Độ.
LeT chính là tổ chức bị quy trách nhiệm gây ra các vụ tấn công đẫm máu ở Mumbai năm 2008./.

description.hltext_display: Luras hit – för att slavjobba
description.content:
Det vanligaste upplägget är att ett bemanningsföretag annonserar efter arbetskraft och utlovar mat och husrum i Sverige. Här hyrs arbetarna sedan ut till andra bolag. Lönen är låg och det förekommer också att arbetarna inte får betalt alls.
Undersökt handel
Institutet för säkerhets- och utvecklingspolitik (ISDP) har på uppdrag av Sida undersökt handeln med människor för arbetskraftsexploatering. Erik Leijonmarck, en av rapportens författare, säger till Svenska Dagbladet, att Sverige saknar beredskap för hur det ska hantera problemet. Polisen får in få anmälningar och ännu finns inga fällande domar.
Ökat med finanskrisen
Rapporten slår också fast att handeln med arbetskraft ökat i och med finanskrisen. Sverige har tillsammans med Storbritannien, Finland och Italien störst problem med arbetskraftsexploatering. Migrationsverket har tillsatt en samordnare för frågor kring människohandel. Enligt en undersökning av Migrationsverket i våras hade personalen i 250 fall kommit i kontakt med misstänkt människohandel.

description.hltext_display: Majority Age 25-29 Only Have Cell Phones
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- In a first for any age group, more than half of Americans age 25-29 live in households with cell phones but no traditional landline telephones.
A report on phone use by the federal Centers for Disease Control and Prevention also found that the younger children are, the likelier they are to live in homes that only have wireless phones. That suggests that younger parents are showing increasing comfort relying only on cell phones even as they adjust from being single to a more settled family lifestyle, according to one of the report's authors.
Taken together, the figures released Tuesday provide the latest evidence of how young people are leading the nation's evolution away from landline phones.
"You could say that among that age group, wireless only is the new norm," said Stephen Blumberg, a senior scientist at CDC and an author of the survey.
The shift toward cell phones and away from landlines is having a wide impact, changing not only how people communicate but the telecommunications industry and the work of pollsters and others who collect data.
The survey showed that overall, 27 percent of U.S. households had only cell phones in the first half of this year, up 2 percentage points since the last half of 2009. That number has been growing rapidly - in the first six months of 2007, just 14 percent of households relied only on wireless service, roughly half of current levels.
Among 25- to 29-year-olds, 51 percent lived in homes with only cell phone service in the first half of 2010. That was up 2 percentage points from the previous six-month period.
For both age groups bracketing them - 18- to 24-year olds, and 30- to 34-year-olds - 4 in 10 lived in cell-only households. After age 35, the likelihood that people live in homes with only wireless service falls off, with only 1 in 20 people age 65 and up living in homes that rely solely on cell phones.
The study also found that among children under age 3, nearly 4 in 10 live in wireless-only households. That figure drops to about a third of children age 3 to 5, and less among older children.
Blumberg said this is significant because it counters the perception - backed by previous data - that cell phone-only households are likelier to be comprised of young, unattached people. The latest numbers suggest that as young people used to living only with cell phones have families, they're keeping their wireless-only habits.
"It's a sign that wireless-only is no longer strictly tied to a lifestyle of being young and restless," Blumberg said.
In addition to cell-only households, the survey found another 16 percent of households have landlines, yet get all or nearly all their calls on their cell phones. Their landlines are usually hooked into computers.
Combined with wireless-only homes, this means that to call 43 percent of American households, the only practical way to do it is to dial their cell phones.
The study also found that:
-The households likeliest to rely only on wireless phones consist of adults who are poor, renters, Hispanics or who live with unrelated housemates. Men were slightly more likely than women to live in homes with only cell phones.
-Only 13 percent of households have landlines and no cell phones - down from 24 percent in early 2007.
-Though people age 18-29 are the heaviest cell phone users, they comprise only 40 percent of all wireless-only adults. That's because young adults make up only about one-fifth of the total adult population.
-Only 16 percent of Northeasterners live in cell phone-only homes, the lowest of any region. The highest frequency of wireless-only households is in the South, where 29 percent live that way.
-About 2 percent of households have no phone service at all, a figure that has changed little in recent years.
The data for the study was compiled in the National Health Interview Survey, conducted by CDC's National Center for Health Statistics. It is based on interviews with members of 17,619 households conducted from January through June this year.

event_or_fact.property: You could say that among that age group, wireless only is the new norm
this is significant because it counters the perception - backed by previous data - that cell phone-only households are likelier to be comprised of young, unattached people
It's a sign that wireless-only is no longer strictly tied to a lifestyle of being young and restless

entity.property: CDC's National Center for Health Statistics
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

description.hltext_display: 日本中青年议员组团访华 欲建立新生代干部人脉
description.content:
环球网12月21日报道，据日本共同社21日报道，日本跨党派议员团体“日中友好议员联盟”的中青年议员将于22日起对中国进行为期5天的访问。此举旨在建立与中国共产党新生代领导干部的人脉关系，同时也将推动改善日中撞船事件后急剧恶化的两国关系。
报道称，访华团由朝野各党的10名议员组成，团长是自民党政调会长代理林芳正。访华期间，议员们将与中共湖南省委书记周强、中共内蒙古自治区党委书记胡春华等人就经济、外交、安全和民间交流等广泛领域交换意见，并在内蒙古参观食品企业等。
“日中友好议员联盟”每两年组团访华一次。林芳正表示，希望双方能就如何努力改善日中关系畅所欲言。

description.hltext_display: 琉球政府主席選で日米資金工作か…外交文書公開
description.content:
読売新聞12月22日（水）15時34分
外務省は２２日午前、沖縄返還を巡る交渉記録などの外交文書のファイル２９１冊を東京・麻布台の外交史料館で公開したが、６８年６月に下田武三駐米大使が外務省に送った沖縄返還の日米交渉に関する公電からは、同年１１月に初めて行われた琉球政府主席公選で、保守系候補の選挙資金に米側が関与していた可能性を示唆する記述もあった。
主席公選では、革新系の屋良朝苗氏が保守系の西銘順治氏との選挙戦を制した。
公電によると、米側の政府高官は「ニシメイ第１でのぞんでいる」と西銘氏の当選が望ましいとの考えを表明。選挙情勢について「本土自民党の援助が手遅れになることを最も心配し、在京米側より党に対しオキナワへの選挙資金送金方法改善方につき直接申し入れを行った」としている。
COPYRIGHT THE YOMIURI SHIMBUN

description.hltext_display: Parks' last-second trey lifts Northwestern over SWA
description.content: The Big Ten Champion Michigan State Spartans practicing one final time on Monday morning before breaking for Christmas. The Spartans' equipment department, however, is getting no such break before the bowl game.

description.hltext_display: Problemen bij Duitse banken gaan ECB dwingen om geld te printen ( Verstraete)
description.content: Bruno Verstraete, van Nautilus Capital is van mening dat we ook in Europa een vorm van Quantative Easing gaan krijgen. De Europese Centrale Bank zal namelijk weinig andere keuzemogelijkheden krijgen. De ECB kan volgens Verstraete zijn rol van last resort van de eurozone onmogelijk kunnen blijven vervullen. De immunisatie van de aangekochte staatsobligaties is alleen mogelijk wanneer die hun waarde behouden, wat niet het geval is. Problemen bij de Duitse banken gaan de ECB uiteindelijk dwingen om geld te printen, waarbij het deflatiegevaar als argument kan worden gebruikt. Van inflatie is namelijk geen gevaar. Wat de banken betreft: de gezonde banken hebben het meeste overheidsobligaties uit de Europese periferie gekocht en lopen dus het meeste risico’s. Het betreft Duitse, Franse en Belgische banken.

description.hltext_display: كارگران توانبخش الوند قزوين 21ماه حقوق نگرفته‌اند
description.content:
تعدادي از كارگران توانبخشي الوند قزوين با مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاري ايلنا نسبت به عدم توجه صاحب اين كارخانه و برخي از مسئولين به نپرداختن 21 ماه از حقوقشان معترض بودند.
ایلنا: تعدادي از كارگران توانبخشي الوند قزوين با مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاري ايلنا نسبت به عدم توجه صاحب اين كارخانه و برخي از مسئولين به نپرداختن 21 ماه از حقوقشان معترض بودند.
به گزارش خبرنگار ايلنا، اين كارگران كه تا 25 سال سابقه كارگري دارند در مراجعه به دفتر خبرگزاري ايلنا در شهر صنعتي البرز از عدم پرداخت حقوق 21 ماهه خود شكايت داشتندو گفتند: با توجه به اينكه كارخانه در حال حاضر توليد و فروش دارد، ولي متاسفانه كارفرما با ادعاي ورشكستگي ،به ما كارگران حقوق نمي دهد.
عدم پرداخت بيمه اين كارگران به تامين اجتماعي در 9 ماه گذشته از ديگر مشكلات كارگران توانبخش الوند قزوين است و اين كارگران اعلام داشتند: در جلسه كميسيون امنيت كارگري شهرستان البرز كه همزمان با سفر رئيس جمهور محترم به استان برگزارشد، نماينده اين شركت در جلسه قول داد تا پانزدهم آذر ماه جاري نسبت به پرداخت 3 ماه از حقوق معوقه اقدام كند كه تاكنون اين قول عملي نشده است.
در ادامه كارگران معترض به طرح شكايت از صاحب شركت به ادار ه هاي كار ، تامين اجتماعي ، دادگستري و... اشاره كردند و گفتند:با سيلي صورتمان را سرخ نگه مي داريم ، برخي ها از ما كارگران هنوز مستاجرند و فرزند دانشجو دارند، كسي به دادمان نمي رسد.
يكي از اين كارگران كه نخواست نامش اعلام شود ،گفت : وقتي مشكلاتمان رابراي برخي از مسئولين مي گوييم، انگار آقايان به داستان گوش مي دهند و دركي از 21 ماه حقوق نگرفتن كارگران ندارند كه جاي تاسف دارد.
يكي ديگر ازاين كارگران با اشك هاي در چشم گفت: تا به حال مشكلمان را رسانه اي نكرديم تا شايد كاري كنند، ولي صاحب كارخانه به تعهد نماينده اش در پرداخت مطالبتان كارگران پايبند نيست.

description.hltext_display: Christmas Demand Boosts Chinese Phone Exports
description.content:
By: Ian Mansfield | 22nd Dec 2010: 8:25am
After several months of decreases, demand related to the holiday season provided a significant boost to China's exports of electronic products in September, according to the market research firm iSuppli.
­Cell phone exports in September reached 63.6 million units, up 4.5 percent from August and up by double-digit percentages from the same month in 2008 and 2009.
"The 2010 holiday season is shaping up to be a very strong period for 3G smart phone demand, as buyers give new phones as gifts," said Kevin Wang, director of China research at iSuppli. "Shipment increases are expected to continue until the end of the year, after which handset exports will fall back into their seasonal pattern of decline following the holiday surge."
Meanwhile, desktop PC exports also began to grow in September after original equipment manufacturers (OEM) boosted their demand to ensure adequate stock on hand for Black Friday and the holidays. Total PC unit exports reached 2.4 million units, up 8 percent from the previous month and an increase of more than 400,000 units compared to September 2009. The growth in demand for PCs also was boosted by China's Golden Week in October, although end-market sales were not as strong as the OEMs had hoped.
PC export shipments are believed to have continued to increase in October and November-but not nearly as much as in September-as OEMs continued to stock up for the holiday season.
For liquid-crystal display televisions (LCD TV), exports from China in September inched up just 1 percent to 5.1 million units from the previous month, as a result of the OEM pricing strategy already set prior to September because of price pressure from the world's leading competitors. Given the prior ramp-up for Black Friday and the holiday season, iSuppli expects October to be a relatively weak month for LCD TV exports.
